Reman Byrrd was a human wizard and brother of Ramen Byrrd, active in the 14 century DR.
Reman stood  tall and weighed around . He had willowy blond hair and blue-green eyes. Overall he was very similar in appearance to his brother Ramen, with people finding it difficult to tell the two apart. They even had similar speech patterns.
Reman and his twin brother Ramen shared an uncanny empathetic link. The twins were able to share ideas and thoughts between them without uttering a single word.
He was capable of casting the spells blindness, burning hands, charm person, clairvoyance, deafness, detect invisibility, ESP, feather fall, friends, flame arrows, identify, improved phantasmal force, knock, levitate, Melfs minute meteors, phantasmal force, secret page, sleep, spectral force, suggestion, summon swarm, unseen servant, ventriloquism, and wizard mark.
Reman typically wore dark brown and blue clothing, to contrast with the pale colored clothes that his brother preferred. Though sometimes he swapped outfits with his brother to confuse others.
On his person, Reman Byrrd wore his magical bracers of defense and was armed with a staff of striking. The brothers also owned a spelljammer ship.
The most notable event in Reman and Ramens lives was their fathers mysterious disappearance that was punctuated by the arrival of a spelljammer ship at their home. The twins took this opportunity to turn the magical vessel into an amusement ride.
